botMessages.message: Welcome to KultKare. I am here to assist you today.

botDialogs.description: Greet the user and review the pre-chat form, if used.
botDialogs.label: Welcome

botMessages.message: Please select your concern

botDialogs.description: Guide the user to select a conversation goal.
botDialogs.label: Main Menu

botMessages.message: I’m sorry you’re having an issue.
Looks like you’ve already reported this issue: "{!Pre_Chat_Case.Subject}."
One of our team members is looking into it. For your reference, the case number is {!Pre_Chat_Case.CaseNumber}.
Let’s open a case for you.
Please describe the issue to me in a few words.
Okay, {!First_Name}, we’ve logged your issue and will start working on it. For your reference, the case number is {!Case_Number}.
Thanks for that.
I’d like to collect your contact information so one of our agents can follow up with you.
Okay, {!First_Name}, we’ve logged your issue and will start working on it. For your reference, the case number is {!Case_Number}.

botDialogs.description: Collect information about an issue and create a case.
botDialogs.label: Report an issue

botMessages.message: Can I get your first name?
And your last name?
What’s your email address?

retryMessages.message: Sorry, I didn’t quite understand, could you please enter that again? Use an email format with an "@" sign and domain name. (Example: name@company.com)
I still didn’t get that. Can you please try again?

botMessages.message: Your preferred phone number?

retryMessages.message: Sorry, I didn’t quite understand, could you please enter that again? Use only numeric characters and the following special characters: "+", "-", "(", and ")".
I still didn’t get that. Can you please try again?

botMessages.message: One last thing, what company are you a part of?

botDialogs.description: Capture customer information to search for and create records.
botDialogs.label: Get user info

botMessages.message: I can help you with that!
Do you have your case number?

retryMessages.message: Sorry, I didn’t quite catch that. Please choose from the options below:
I’m still having trouble understanding...please choose from the options below:

botMessages.message: Oh, alright. Let’s connect you to a service agent who can help look up your case.
Please enter the case number here.

retryMessages.message: Sorry, I’m having some trouble understanding. Please use only letters, numbers, underscores, dashes, and periods, without spaces.
I still didn’t get that. Can you please try again?

botMessages.message: Now, I just need your email for verification purposes.

retryMessages.message: Sorry, I didn’t quite understand, could you please enter that again? Use an email format with an "@" sign and domain name. (Example: name@company.com)
I still didn’t get that. Can you please try again?

botMessages.message: Thank you. One moment while I look up your case...

botDialogs.description: Return the status of an existing case and add comments.
botDialogs.label: Check the status of an existing issue

botMessages.message: I found your case: "{!Looked_up_Case.Subject}"
The status is currently {!Looked_up_Case.Status}.
Would you like to add a comment to your case?

retryMessages.message: Sorry, I didn’t quite catch that. Please choose from the options below:
I’m still having trouble understanding...please choose from the options below:

botMessages.message: Okay!
Unfortunately, I couldn’t find a case matching that case number and email address...
Okay. What would you like to add?
Alright, I’ve added that comment to your case for review.
I can help you with that!
Do you have your order number?

retryMessages.message: Sorry, I didn’t quite catch that. Please choose from the options below:
I’m still having trouble understanding...please choose from the options below:

botMessages.message: Oh, alright. Let’s connect you to a service agent who can help look up your order.
Please enter the order number here.

retryMessages.message: Sorry, I’m having some trouble understanding. Please use only letters, numbers, underscores, dashes, and periods, without spaces.
I still didn’t get that. Can you please try again?

botMessages.message: Thank you. One moment while I look up your order...

botDialogs.description: Return the status of an existing order.
botDialogs.label: Check the status of an order

botMessages.message: Here’s what I found:
Your order with Order Number {!Order_Number} for ${!Order_Amount_Text} is currently in {!Order_Status} status.
Would you like to change something about this order?
Unfortunately, I couldn’t find that order number in our system...

botDialogs.description: Reset specific bot variables to allow for new requests.
botDialogs.label: Clear memory

botMessages.message: Can I assist you with anything else?

botQuickReplyOptions.literalValue: Yes - Take me back to the Main Menu
No - I’m all set for now

retryMessages.message: Sorry, I didn’t quite catch that. Please choose from the options below:

botDialogs.description: Offer the user a chance to start over or end the chat.
botDialogs.label: Anything else?

botMessages.message: Sorry, I’m still learning. I’m afraid I didn’t understand that, can you please try again?

botDialogs.description: Send a message when the bot doesn't understand the user.
botDialogs.label: Confused

botMessages.message: Would you like me to connect you to an agent who can assist further?

retryMessages.message: Sorry, I didn’t quite catch that. Please choose from the options below:
I’m still having trouble understanding...please choose from the options below:

botMessages.message: Sure, one moment.

botDialogs.description: Transfer the conversation to an agent or queue.

botMessages.message: Apologies, our Chat services are temporarily down due to technical issues. Please retry later. For assistance, call +91 9987991000 or email CS@kult.app. We apologize for any inconvenience.
